Gear up to celebrate Singapore’s birthday. Drive home your BMW with 52% off the M Sport Package and discount perks on selected models!

Make 303 Alexandra Road the place to visit today because you will be in for a treat of local delights by Bao Makers and face painting activities for your little ones! See you there! 

*Terms and conditions apply.

2.post_text:
Start your National Day celebrations with Performance Motors this weekend. From 5th to 9th August, do not miss the exclusive deals we have lined up just for you.

Visit us at 303 Alexandra Road on the 5th, 6th and 9th of August and you will be in for a treat of local delights by Bao Makers and face painting activities for the little ones! See you there!

3.post_text:
The 5 Elements campaign featured how the BMW 7 Series incorporated innovation and excellence in design. We are excited to announce that this campaign garnered the highest total points from distinguished judges and won the Gold award and the Grand Prix award for the SPH iink Award 2017. 

We would like to thank all our customers for your continuous support and we will continue to bring you greater service excellence.

13.post_text:
The Performance Motors BMW Motorrad Oil Service Package is back due to popular demand. A smooth running engine is vital for optimum riding pleasure. With Original BMW Motorrad Engine Oil, this package is aimed at providing your bike with the best in material and equipment.
So enjoy up to 20% off when you sign up today for our PML BMW Motorrad Oil Service Package. Promotion is now valid till 30 September 2017.

15.post_text:

Enjoy more quality family time with the BMW 216i Gran Tourer, yours at the special launch price of $149,800*. Limited units available. 

Visit Performance Motors at 303 Alexandra Road or call 6653 8051 to find out more.

*Terms and conditions apply.

The new BMW 4 Series combines stylish aesthetics and sporting dynamism for an irresistible performance on the road. Designed with a low centre of gravity, high body stiffness and TwinPower Turbo engines, it offers you thrilling power on every drive.

Visit Performance Motors or call 6653 8051 for a test drive with the new BMW 4 Series and its variants – the BMW 420i Gran Coupé Sport, BMW 420i Coupé Sport and BMW 420i Convertible.

23.post_text:
BMW Performance Fest 2017 came to a close last weekend as we celebrated the hardworking believers and big achievers in us! We were treated to delightful favourites from Park Bench Deli and had our thirst quenched by the good people behind Coffee Break and The Rabbit Hole Salad & Juice. Family and friends were also treated to a host of activities that included a golf putting station and DIY office plant workshop by The Little Flower Shop. 

We hope everyone who joined us the past few weeks at BMW Performance Fest 2017 had an enjoyable time. Do follow us on our Facebook Page to stay updated with any upcoming events and deals!

#Performance1toi

comments.message: Thank you for the opportunity to be part of Performance Fest 2017. 🚗
